name: HTML
template:
{{#payload.showSignOut}}

{{/payload.showSignOut}}
{{{payload.content}}}

name: View data
CSS
JS
Database
info: Send SQL commands to sqlite3 and return result

name: Process NMEA data
SQL - Write GPS reading
Filter positional readings
Moved since last write?
SQL - Create table
func:
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE gps_readings (latitude real, longitude real, timestamp integer);";
return msg;

name: SQL - Retrieve 10 latest readings
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM gps_readings ORDER BY ROWID DESC LIMIT 10;";

return msg;

name: SQL - Retrieve latest reading
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT ROWID, * FROM gps_readings ORDER BY ROWID DESC LIMIT 1;";

return msg;

name: Map web page
template: {{payload.timestamp}} {{payload.latitudeDms}}, {{payload.longitudeDms}}

name: View data
SQL - Retrieve reading by id
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT ROWID, * FROM gps_readings WHERE ROWID = " + msg.req.query.readingId + ";";

return msg;

name: SQL - Retrieve reading before timestamp
Set redirect location
SQL - List all readings
SQL - Retrieve latest reading
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM gps_readings ORDER BY ROWID DESC LIMIT 1;";

return msg;

name: Signed out web page
template:
Signed out

Sign in
